name: Reason Type for Late Shipment
description: 1st party means the reason why the item is late is controllable by Arlon. On the other hand, 3rd party means the item is late of external reasons.

annotations.name: TabularEditor_InPerspective
annotations.value: ["BI Morning Dashboard","CS Dashboard","Finance","Generic Sales","Inventory","Open Orders Report","Product Management","Sales Orders","Warehouse"]
